data.event: The Windsor Theatre constructed in 1925 is a long-standing institution, showing cinema to the locals usually two films per night.
Brighton Post Office opened on 27 August 1849.
Brighton Jetty Post Office opened on 1 March 1950 and closed in 1979.
Brighton Jetty Post Office opened on 1 March 1950 and closed in 1979.
The first Brighton Town Hall was built in 1869 and was just the fourth Town Hall built in the colony of South Australia.
The architect and builder was George William Highet who arrived in the colony in 1836.
G. W. Highet served as a town clerk and Councillor and died in Brighton aged 80 years.

event.title: was used as the civic centre of the City of Brighton from 1869

data.event: It was used as the civic centre of the City of Brighton from 1869 until 1936 when it was then leased by the RSL.
